price: Kuma akwai daga mutãne* wanda maganarsa tana bã ka sha'awa a cikin rãyuwar dũniya, alhãli yanã shaidar da Allah a kan abin da yake cikin zuciyarsa, kuma shi mai tsananin husũma ne.
arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يُعۡجِبُكَ قَوۡلُهُۥ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَيُشۡهِدُ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ مَا فِي قَلۡبِهِۦ وَهُوَ أَلَدُّ ٱلۡخِصَامِ
footnotes: * Bayãnin munafuki da hãlayensa, a cikin jama'a, a san shi, dõmin kada a dõgara a kansa. Haka mutumin kirki shi ma ana son a san shi dõmin a dogara da shi kamar yadda yayi bayãninsa.

version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
